summary:
...POTENTIAL FOR FLASH FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF NORTHERN NEW YORK AND NORTHERN NEW ENGLABND TAPERS OFF LATE... ...A COUPLE OF TORNADOES REMAIN POSSIBLE INTO THE LATE EVENING...
 As of 11:00 PM EDT Wed Jul 10
 the center of Beryl was located near 43.1, -80.3
 with movement ENE at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
